siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text: Hello, everyone! Today, after years of development, I finally managed to release Azmar Quest (old school RPG) on the App Store! Azmar Quest is both a text-based adventure, with multiple choice dialogues, and a turn-based RPG. It's playable offline (single-player story) or online (with PvP, Dungeons, 2v2, etc..) Let me know what you think about it! The game is also fully accessible to blind users through voiceover support. Azmar Quest (Old School RPG) Azmar Quest is an Old School RPG, offering both a Text RPG adventure and a Turn Based RPG strategy game experience. It's… DetailsAzmar Quest is an Old School RPG, offering both a Text RPG adventure and a Turn Based RPG strategy game experience. It's set in a fantasy world called Azmar, where the danger is around the corner. You can play Azmar offline (single player story) or online (PvP and Co-op). Main Features: ● Single Player RPG adventure (playable offline too) ● PvP battles (1v1 and 2v2) and Co-op Dungeons (online) Gameplay: ● Choose 1 of the 4 hero classes available: Warrior, Cleric, Warlock or Archer, each with their own strategy. ● 24 unique skills per class, 4 armor slots and 4 potion slots to create your build and enhance your Hero. ● Follow the story of Azmar in a text based RPG adventure, make your own choices through the story, fight 100+ unique enemies in turn based battles, and reach level 30! Does the game have anything else to offer? Of course it does! ● Face new Single Player challenges and quests every day, or fight in the 2v2 Arena with an AI companion, and reach Mastery 100! ● Play online in Dungeons and 2v2 battles, or play 1v1 rated battles, and reach rank 1000 in PvP! Notes: • Azmar Quest is designed to be accessible and playable for blind users too, through the use of talkback or voice-over technology. Enjoy the text based RPG adventure without barriers! • Azmar Quest is completely free-to-play, with no content locked behind paywalls or timers. It only has a few optional ads and optional in-app purchases. • The game is only in ENGLISH. It's very unlikely that I will have time to translate it, but you never know. • This is a one-person project. I'm constantly developing and improving it. It just takes a lot of time, have patience :) Follow us or join the Azmar Quest community: • Discord: https://discord.gg/fTTMD6paRJ • Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Azmar/ • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/azmar.official • X (ex-Twitter): https://twitter.com/s_games_apps • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEztAwbumYCfpHV11dw3__Q • TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sgames.apps.mobile • Website: https://azmar-online-eu.web.app/ Genre:Role Playing, Strategy TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal https://apps.apple.com/us/app/azmar-quest-old-school-rpg/id6450108505 D&D type RPG text adventuring like we don’t see anymore. Refreshingly irreverent story in chapter one, a break from the usual fantasy prattle. Starting Chapter 2 which is structured differently. So it’s looking promising. Combat has an energy generation system to add interest. Turns were bit of a chore till I discovered the auto-turn option in settings. Would be better switched on by default, or make players aware in the tutorial. Sounds interesting, I’ve given it a download to check it out when I get a chance. I do love D&D themes and rpg games and also enjoy turn based games. All that plus I use to play text based MUD’s so I should like this. Patreon Bronze I’m keen on this game from the description, but I’m experiencing technical difficulties. The combat screen is empty – just the background art. I can make gray panels flicker into existence by swiping, but the center panel just disappears after a brief moment. Any ideas on resolving? Patreon Bronze So glad I asked! Thank you. wow can you make this account sound anymore fake ! Azmar Quest has been updated to 1.3.5 version! Changelog: • Chapter 4: changed all images of the ship and of the city of Vorsall, along with some minor text fixes and bug fixes. • When you Pick-Lock a Treasure and it goes in cool-down, treasures for which you have a key, or that are already unlocked, won't go in cool-down with it anymore (this change was asked by a lot of users!) • Increased the chance of getting a higher rank Item by 40%. Also, increased the Master of Items chance to get a higher rank Item from 15% to 30%. • Fixed a rare bug that could generate a Rank 4 Armor by mistake (the Max Rank should be 3) • Fixed a bug that permitted a player to get infinite honor during the Missing Cat mission (the exploit was actually clever though) • Improved accessibility for players that use Voiceover. I also wanted to ask: have you ever experienced a crash on Azmar? Because I've noticed some sporadic iOS crash reports related to the audio. Maybe with this version I might have fixed them, but I'm not sure. I just released a new update, in which (finally) skills now have their specific sounds. For example, a sword attack will have a slashing sound, a spell attack will have a magic sound, a shield attack will have a shield sound, and so on. You need to turn on the option called Skill-Specific Sounds. For now, the default option is off. Let me know what you think about them, If you like it I may actually set this feature to be on by default. Also, for online players, I have expanded the Global Chat! You can now see who's online, send friend requests and create Dungeon or 2v2 Groups! I've finally added the fourth character slot, along with a redesign of the hero selection page! Now you can try all four classes. This new update is already live! I have just released a new update that, among other things, will greatly improve the fights in Dungeons! When an enemy in a Dungeon is defeated, all support skills of all players reset. For example, if you use a support skill with a 4-turn cooldown and an enemy is killed, that support skill, along with all others, will reset and be available again. This change will slightly reduce the difficulty of encounters against 2 or 3 enemies, and make the support role stronger and slightly more technical. For the next update, I’ve made some changes to the Clown Box Toxin, as some users felt it was unfair to die immediately. Now, the Toxin only halves the player's health instead of instantly killing them. This makes the Dungeon more challenging when it triggers, but not impossible. Also, who knows, the Clown Box might make a return in a future mission! PS: For those who don’t know what the Clown Box is, by clicking it you can receive 1 of 6 possible prizes, some of which are obviously better than others: a map of the Dungeon, a power-up, infectious worms, a random bag of gold, the Toxin I mentioned, or the box explodes. Since some new players have been struggling to beat the first Boss, I wanted to add a Popup that will only appear the first time they lose against him. It gives tips and some free gold, so they can buy a potion to beat him. With limited skills at the start, and not knowing how to play Azmar Quest yet, I think this could really help new players. What do you think? Should I introduce this popup, or should I let them suffer? Since I don't play it, I'll cast my vote on [SUFFER]. In the end, I decided not to let them suffer too much, at least against the first boss. They'll have plenty of time to cry from the second one onward. I think that's a good approach to causing suffering, too. Let them feel comfortable and confident and then stab them in the back. On a serious note, that might help avoid players from bouncing off early due to difficulty, so your decision is quite the right approach. Hi everyone! I just released a new update today on the App Store! The biggest change is probably the complete redesign of the images in Chapter 5 and Extra Mission 5 (The Hyperion Riot) along with some bug fixes and text fixes. Another significant change includes two new features: Item Rank Boost to upgrade items and Armor Star Boost to add a star to an armor, increasing its max rank. I’ve also added Chat History in Dungeons and a new feature called Reunite Party. Oh, and now you can send 2v2 and Dungeon invites even if the other player is already in queue. And for new players, most encounters in Azmar Forest, so in Chapter 2 and the Extra Mission, now grant extra experience. Note: I should've released this update way earlier, but I recently got two little kittens. They're adorable, but a lot of work! A new update for Azmar Quest is now available on the App Store! All images in the Story and Extra Missions have been updated, along with a few bug fixes and text fixes, and improvements to the Veiled Realm. Hopefully, I'll finally be able to focus on expanding the game with Mastery Missions. The plan is to expand the maximum Mastery to 100, with a new Chapter unlocking every 10 Mastery levels. I'm also considering adding 4 Legendary Weapons per class, each with its own set of Talents, unlockable through Mastery. This is just an idea for now, but I kind of like it. Happy December, everyone! To celebrate Black Friday, the holiday season, and the 1-year anniversary of the first public release of Azmar Quest, in December 2023, I'm giving away some Gift Codes for Lifetime Premium in Azmar Quest! Note: If you're already Premium, or you are already playing Azmar Quest and would prefer gold, I'm also offering Gift Codes for 3000 gold, usable on any character! If you're interested, just comment if you want the Lifetime Premium or the gold, and I'll send you a Gift Code for the App Store in a conversation. Happy holidays! I would love a lifetime premium code!!!! Sure, I sent you one! If you haven't an account yet, I'd suggest you to log-in with Apple, it's easier. Let me know if you encountered any problem. 1. Hello, everyone!

    Today, after years of development, I finally managed to release Azmar Quest (old school RPG) on the App Store!

    Azmar Quest is both a text-based adventure, with multiple choice dialogues, and a turn-based RPG. It's playable offline (single-player story) or online (with PvP, Dungeons, 2v2, etc..)

    Let me know what you think about it! The game is also fully accessible to blind users through voiceover support.

    Azmar Quest (Old School RPG)

    Azmar Quest is an Old School RPG, offering both a Text RPG adventure and a Turn Based RPG strategy game experience. It's…
    Details
    Azmar Quest is an Old School RPG, offering both a Text RPG adventure and a Turn Based RPG strategy game experience. It's set in a fantasy world called Azmar, where the danger is around the corner. You can play Azmar offline (single player story) or online (PvP and Co-op). Main Features: ● Single Player RPG adventure (playable offline too) ● PvP battles (1v1 and 2v2) and Co-op Dungeons (online) Gameplay: ● Choose 1 of the 4 hero classes available: Warrior, Cleric, Warlock or Archer, each with their own strategy. ● 24 unique skills per class, 4 armor slots and 4 potion slots to create your build and enhance your Hero. ● Follow the story of Azmar in a text based RPG adventure, make your own choices through the story, fight 100+ unique enemies in turn based battles, and reach level 30! Does the game have anything else to offer? Of course it does! ● Face new Single Player challenges and quests every day, or fight in the 2v2 Arena with an AI companion, and reach Mastery 100! ● Play online in Dungeons and 2v2 battles, or play 1v1 rated battles, and reach rank 1000 in PvP! Notes: • Azmar Quest is designed to be accessible and playable for blind users too, through the use of talkback or voice-over technology. Enjoy the text based RPG adventure without barriers! • Azmar Quest is completely free-to-play, with no content locked behind paywalls or timers. It only has a few optional ads and optional in-app purchases. • The game is only in ENGLISH. It's very unlikely that I will have time to translate it, but you never know. • This is a one-person project. I'm constantly developing and improving it. It just takes a lot of time, have patience :) Follow us or join the Azmar Quest community: • Discord: https://discord.gg/fTTMD6paRJ • Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Azmar/ • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/azmar.official • X (ex-Twitter): https://twitter.com/s_games_apps • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEztAwbumYCfpHV11dw3__Q • TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sgames.apps.mobile • Website: https://azmar-online-eu.web.app/

  2. D&D type RPG text adventuring like we don’t see anymore. Refreshingly irreverent story in chapter one, a break from the usual fantasy prattle. Starting Chapter 2 which is structured differently. So it’s looking promising. Combat has an energy generation system to add interest. Turns were bit of a chore till I discovered the auto-turn option in settings. Would be better switched on by default, or make players aware in the tutorial.
  3. Sounds interesting, I’ve given it a download to check it out when I get a chance. I do love D&D themes and rpg games and also enjoy turn based games. All that plus I use to play text based MUD’s so I should like this.

  4. Patreon Bronze

    I’m keen on this game from the description, but I’m experiencing technical difficulties.

    The combat screen is empty – just the background art. I can make gray panels flicker into existence by swiping, but the center panel just disappears after a brief moment.

    Any ideas on resolving?

  5. Patreon Bronze

    So glad I asked! Thank you.

  6. wow can you make this account sound anymore fake !

  7. Azmar Quest has been updated to 1.3.5 version! Changelog:

    • Chapter 4: changed all images of the ship and of the city of Vorsall, along with some minor text fixes and bug fixes.
    • When you Pick-Lock a Treasure and it goes in cool-down, treasures for which you have a key, or that are already unlocked, won't go in cool-down with it anymore (this change was asked by a lot of users!)
    • Increased the chance of getting a higher rank Item by 40%. Also, increased the Master of Items chance to get a higher rank Item from 15% to 30%.

    • Fixed a rare bug that could generate a Rank 4 Armor by mistake (the Max Rank should be 3)
    • Fixed a bug that permitted a player to get infinite honor during the Missing Cat mission (the exploit was actually clever though)
    • Improved accessibility for players that use Voiceover.

    I also wanted to ask: have you ever experienced a crash on Azmar? Because I've noticed some sporadic iOS crash reports related to the audio. Maybe with this version I might have fixed them, but I'm not sure.

  8. I just released a new update, in which (finally) skills now have their specific sounds. For example, a sword attack will have a slashing sound, a spell attack will have a magic sound, a shield attack will have a shield sound, and so on. You need to turn on the option called Skill-Specific Sounds.

    For now, the default option is off. Let me know what you think about them, If you like it I may actually set this feature to be on by default.

    Also, for online players, I have expanded the Global Chat! You can now see who's online, send friend requests and create Dungeon or 2v2 Groups!

  9. I've finally added the fourth character slot, along with a redesign of the hero selection page! Now you can try all four classes. This new update is already live!

  10. I have just released a new update that, among other things, will greatly improve the fights in Dungeons!

    When an enemy in a Dungeon is defeated, all support skills of all players reset. For example, if you use a support skill with a 4-turn cooldown and an enemy is killed, that support skill, along with all others, will reset and be available again.

    This change will slightly reduce the difficulty of encounters against 2 or 3 enemies, and make the support role stronger and slightly more technical.

  11. For the next update, I’ve made some changes to the Clown Box Toxin, as some users felt it was unfair to die immediately.

    Now, the Toxin only halves the player's health instead of instantly killing them. This makes the Dungeon more challenging when it triggers, but not impossible. Also, who knows, the Clown Box might make a return in a future mission!

    PS: For those who don’t know what the Clown Box is, by clicking it you can receive 1 of 6 possible prizes, some of which are obviously better than others: a map of the Dungeon, a power-up, infectious worms, a random bag of gold, the Toxin I mentioned, or the box explodes.

  12. Since some new players have been struggling to beat the first Boss, I wanted to add a Popup that will only appear the first time they lose against him.

    It gives tips and some free gold, so they can buy a potion to beat him.

    With limited skills at the start, and not knowing how to play Azmar Quest yet, I think this could really help new players.

    What do you think? Should I introduce this popup, or should I let them suffer?

  13. Since I don't play it, I'll cast my vote on [SUFFER].

  14. In the end, I decided not to let them suffer too much, at least against the first boss.

    They'll have plenty of time to cry from the second one onward.

  15. I think that's a good approach to causing suffering, too. Let them feel comfortable and confident and then stab them in the back. On a serious note, that might help avoid players from bouncing off early due to difficulty, so your decision is quite the right approach.

  16. Hi everyone! I just released a new update today on the App Store!

    The biggest change is probably the complete redesign of the images in Chapter 5 and Extra Mission 5 (The Hyperion Riot) along with some bug fixes and text fixes.

    Another significant change includes two new features: Item Rank Boost to upgrade items and Armor Star Boost to add a star to an armor, increasing its max rank.

    I’ve also added Chat History in Dungeons and a new feature called Reunite Party.

    Oh, and now you can send 2v2 and Dungeon invites even if the other player is already in queue.

    And for new players, most encounters in Azmar Forest, so in Chapter 2 and the Extra Mission, now grant extra experience.

    Note: I should've released this update way earlier, but I recently got two little kittens. They're adorable, but a lot of work!

  17. A new update for Azmar Quest is now available on the App Store!

    All images in the Story and Extra Missions have been updated, along with a few bug fixes and text fixes, and improvements to the Veiled Realm.

    Hopefully, I'll finally be able to focus on expanding the game with Mastery Missions.

    The plan is to expand the maximum Mastery to 100, with a new Chapter unlocking every 10 Mastery levels.

    I'm also considering adding 4 Legendary Weapons per class, each with its own set of Talents, unlockable through Mastery. This is just an idea for now, but I kind of like it.

  18. Happy December, everyone!

    To celebrate Black Friday, the holiday season, and the 1-year anniversary of the first public release of Azmar Quest, in December 2023, I'm giving away some Gift Codes for Lifetime Premium in Azmar Quest!

    Note: If you're already Premium, or you are already playing Azmar Quest and would prefer gold, I'm also offering Gift Codes for 3000 gold, usable on any character!

    If you're interested, just comment if you want the Lifetime Premium or the gold, and I'll send you a Gift Code for the App Store in a conversation.

    Happy holidays!

  19. I would love a lifetime premium code!!!!

  20. Sure, I sent you one! If you haven't an account yet, I'd suggest you to log-in with Apple, it's easier.

    Let me know if you encountered any problem.
